# <a name="how-to-view-outlookcom-message-headers-or-message-source"></a><span data-ttu-id="b51bb-102">如何查看 Outlook.com 郵件頭或郵件來源</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b51bb-102">How to view Outlook.com message headers or message source</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b51bb-103">若要查看電子郵件中的標題和其他詳細資料，請選取三個點。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b51bb-103">To see the headers and other details in an email, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="b51bb-104">，然後選取 [ **View message source**] （讀取窗格）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b51bb-104">at the top corner of the reading pane and select **View message source**.</span></span>
